resources.string: Why pay $999+ for the iPhoneX when you can get the same look for FREE! Behold, AndroidX. Enable your iPhoneX look today
Enabling this feature will add the iPhoneX Notch to your phone. Saves you from paying big bucks for an iPhoneX!
Copyright %s, Leonard Tatum. All Rights Reserved.

This app is 100% free, created for the education, convenience and use of the public. There will never be in-app purchases or alternative paid versions of the app. To learn about other apps Leonard Tatum is working on, connect with him on social media or send him an email with your questions or comments. Cheers!
For feedback or support, contact\n Leonard Tatum at ljtatum@hotmail.com

Leonard Tatum is committed to protecting your privacy and providing the best user experience possible. This is why data collected will never be sold or traded to others. \n\nInformation collected may be used to (i) remember information so you will not have to re-enter it during your session or the next sessions you are using the Service (ii) provide personalize content and information to you and others, which could include online ads or other forms of marketing (iii) provide, improve, test and monitor the effectiveness of our Service (iv) develop and test new products and features (v) diagnose or fix bugs and issues.
Enabling this feature will run the Service while the app is open. This will conserve your overall battery life
Enabling this feature allows the aesthetic to work! Keep this enabled at all times
